live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
51194.summary: Some customers in the Quesnel View area of Quesnel are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
51194.title: July 2 - Quesnel (Quesnel View) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
